about_the_game:
Take off on the Wings of Angels with Kenji Nakahara, his friends, and his copilots!

Hundreds of years into the future, a mysterious race known as the Sierrans has come pouring through the jump point - and humanity is up against the ropes. Pressed into military service, you're off to the Alliance Space Force where you'll get to make every single decision for Kenji during what will come to be called "The Battle of Epsilon Iridani." From his choices in the cockpit to how he navigates his relationships with his friends, copilots, and maybe even his lovers - your decisions MATTER in this Visual Novel from ERODH C & C.

And speaking of relationships - if you thought navigating life as a single guy was hard, just wait until you try it in the middle of a war! The results can be anywhere from hilarious to sexy as we combine the ecchi genre with epic sci-fi storytelling. From your old friend Ayako to your red-hot Commanding Officer, your relationships evolve naturally with your choices. Don't forget: the fleet is small and your reputation proceeds you!

And with 31 unlockable CGs and some very sexy finales to each romance plot, the Angels on your wing will give you plenty of reason to come back for more! As an added bonus, you'll get additional unlockable CGs in the form of an ending tracker - visual novel explorers will never be left to wonder if they've seen it all, yet.

Wings of Angels does not contain nudity or explicit descriptions of sexual activity.

content_descriptors.notes:
Wings of Angels features dating sim elements and romance plot lines.

Sexually suggestive content includes:
Frequent use of images of women in revealing clothing
Partially-veiled nudity (nude, but censored breasts and midsection with hair, steam, furniture, etc.)
Suggestions of sexual activity through fade-to-black

Wings of Angels does not include explicit descriptions of sexual activity or explicit imagery.

Other mature content includes:
Use (and improper use) of alcohol.
Non-graphic violence (space dogfighting)
Some blood or depictions of injury (no gore).

Take off on the Wings of Angels with Kenji Nakahara, his friends, and his copilots!

Hundreds of years into the future, a mysterious race known as the Sierrans has come pouring through the jump point - and humanity is up against the ropes. Pressed into military service, you're off to the Alliance Space Force where you'll get to make every single decision for Kenji during what will come to be called "The Battle of Epsilon Iridani." And speaking of relationships - if you thought navigating life as a single guy was hard, just wait until you try it in the middle of a war! The results can be anywhere from hilarious to sexy as we combine the ecchi genre with epic sci-fi storytelling. From your old friend Ayako to your red-hot Commanding Officer, your relationships evolve naturally with your choices. Don't forget: the fleet is small and your reputation proceeds you!

And with 31 unlockable CGs and some very sexy finales to each romance plot, the Angels on your wing will give you plenty of reason to come back for more! As an added bonus, you'll get additional unlockable CGs in the form of an ending tracker - visual novel explorers will never be left to wonder if they've seen it all, yet.

legal_notice: This visual assets for this game were made using AI art generation. We consider all non-UI artwork in this game, to include character sprites and images, to be public domain.
name: Wings of Angels

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.5 Ghz Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.5 Ghz Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

Violência fantasiosa
Linguagem imprópria
Conteúdo sexual

short_description: Fun, romance, drama, and sexy moments with the beautiful babes of "Wings of Angels", a science fiction Visual Novel featuring some of the hottest co-pilots you'll ever fly with.
